price: Na kwamba kwao Mola wako Mlezi ndio mwisho.
footnotes: Na kwamba kwa hakika ni kwa Mola wako Mlezi, wala si kwa mwenginewe, ndio miadi ya kurejea.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
